title: e-Learning Cost Management Strategies for Healthcare Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Basic medical field knowledge and fundamental financial management concepts
context.additional_context: Requires mobile-optimized content for smartphone-based learning, focusing on budget management for medical institutions and cost-efficient education.

learning_goals: Learners can classify medical e-learning development cost components (labor, technical infrastructure, content production costs, etc.) with 80% accuracy
Learners can analyze e-learning cost-efficiency compared to traditional face-to-face education using three metrics (time savings, workforce minimization, scalability)
Learners can apply mobile-optimized low-cost e-learning production techniques (template utilization, microlearning design) to real-world cases

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
